row.process:
:SET &CREATE_AE_DATA_DIRS# = GET_VAR(VARA.MAINTENANCE,CREATE_AE_DATA_DIRS,1)
:IF &CREATE_AE_DATA_DIRS# = "Y" : RESOLVE &AE_DATA# = "{VARA.MAINTENANCE,AE_DATA,1}" : P AE_DATA: &AE_DATA#
: SET &DHND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.DB.AE_DATA_DIRS)
: PROCESS &DHND# : SET &SUBDIR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&DHND#,1) : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &SUBDIR# = STR_SUB(&SUBDIR#,'/','\') IF NOT EXIST &AE_DATA#\&SUBDIR# md &AE_DATA#\&SUBDIR# : CASE "UNIX" : SET &SUBDIR# = STR_SUB(&SUBDIR#,'\','/') [ ! -d "&AE_DATA#/&SUBDIR#" ] && mkdir -p &AE_DATA#/&SUBDIR# : ENDSWITCH : ENDPROCESS
: CLOSE_PROCESS &DHND# :ENDIF
